```typescriptreact
'use client';

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useSession } from 'next-auth/react';
import { useToast } from '@/components/ui/Toast';
import { CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline';
import { LoadingOverlay, PageLoading } from '@/components/ui/LoadingStates';
import { hasPermission } from '@/lib/permissions';

interface Assignment {
  id: string;
  studentName: string;
  eventType: string;
  eventTitle: string;
  location: string;
  startTime: string;
  duration: number;
  notes?: string;
  responsibleParty: string;
  pointOfContact?: string;
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'denied';
  createdBy?: string;
  createdAt: string;
  deniedReason?: string;
}

interface AssignmentApprovalProps {
  showPendingOnly?: boolean;
}

export function AssignmentApproval({ showPendingOnly = true }: AssignmentApprovalProps) {
  const { data: session } = useSession();
  const { showToast } = useToast();
  const [assignments, setAssignments] = useState<Assignment[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [processingId, setProcessingId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [denialReason, setDenialReason] = useState<string>('');
  const [showDenialModal, setShowDenialModal] = useState<string | null>(null);

  const canApprove = session?.user && hasPermission(session.user.role, 'approveAssignments');

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchAssignments();
  }, []);

  const fetchAssignments = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetch('/api/assignments');
      if (response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        // Filter assignments based on props and user permissions
        let filteredData = data;
        
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          filteredData = data.filter((assignment: Assignment) => assignment.status === 'pending');
        }
        
        setAssignments(filteredData);
      } else {
        throw new Error('Failed to fetch assignments');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching assignments:', error);
      showToast({ 
        type: 'error', 
        title: 'Failed to load assignments',
        message: 'Please check your connection and try again.'
      });
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleApprove = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to approve assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        const result = await response.json();
        showToast({
          type: 'success',
          title: 'Assignment approved',
          message: 'Assignment approved successfully'
        });
        // Remove approved assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'approved' as const }
              : a
          ));
        }
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to approve assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error approving assignment:', error);
      showToast(`Failed to approve assignment: ${error.message}`, 'error');
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const handleDeny = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast('You do not have permission to deny assignments', 'error');
      return;
    }

    if (!denialReason.trim()) {
      showToast('Please provide a reason for denial', 'warning');
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'DELETE',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({ reason: denialReason }),
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        showToast('Assignment denied', 'success');
        // Remove denied assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'denied' as const, deniedReason }
              : a
          ));
        }
        setShowDenialModal(null);
        setDenialReason('');
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to deny assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error denying assignment:', error);
      showToast(`Failed to deny assignment: ${error.message}`, 'error');
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const openDenialModal = (assignmentId: string) => {
    setShowDenialModal(assignmentId);
    setDenialReason('');
  };

  const formatDateTime = (dateTimeStr: string) => {
    const date = new Date(dateTimeStr);
    return {
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      time: date.toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })
    };
  };

  const getStatusBadge = (status: Assignment['status']) => {
    switch (status) {
      case 'pending':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800">
            <ClockIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Pending
          </span>
        );
      case 'approved':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800">
            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Approved
          </span>
        );
      case 'denied':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-100 text-red-800">
            <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Denied
          </span>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <PageLoading message="Loading assignments..." />;
  }

  if (!canApprove && showPendingOnly) {
    return (
      <div className="p-6 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg">
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-400 mr-2" />
          <p className="text-sm text-yellow-700">
            You do not have permission to approve assignments. Contact an administrator or instructor.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (assignments.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="text-center py-12">
        <ClockIcon className="mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-gray-400" />
        <h3 className="mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
          {showPendingOnly ? 'No pending assignments' : 'No assignments found'}
        </h3>
        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
          {showPendingOnly 
            ? 'All assignments have been processed.' 
            : 'Assignments will appear here when created.'
          }
        </p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="space-y-4">
      <div className="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-md">
        <ul className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
          {assignments.map((assignment) => {
            const { date, time } = formatDateTime(assignment.startTime);
            const isProcessing = processingId === assignment.id;
            
            return (
              <li key={assignment.id} className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                  <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
                    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                        <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate">
                          {assignment.eventTitle}
                        </h3>
                        {getStatusBadge(assignment.status)}
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                        {date} at {time}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Student:</span> {assignment.studentName}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Type:</span> {assignment.eventType}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Location:</span> {assignment.location}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Duration:</span> {assignment.duration} min
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <span className="font-medium">Responsible Party:</span> {assignment.responsibleParty}
                      {assignment.pointOfContact && (
                        <span className="ml-4">
                          <span className="font-medium">Contact:</span> {assignment.pointOfContact}
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                    
                    {assignment.notes && (
                      <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span className="font-medium">Notes:</span> {assignment.notes}
                      </div>
                    )}
                    
                    {assignment.deniedReason && (
                      <div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded text-sm text-red-700">
                        <span className="font-medium">Denial Reason:</span> {assignment.deniedReason}
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  
                  {canApprove && assignment.status === 'pending' && (
                    <div className="ml-6 flex space-x-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleApprove(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Approve assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        {isProcessing ? (
                          <span className="flex items-center">
                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-3 w-3 border-b-2 border-white mr-1"></div>
                            Processing...
                          </span>
                        ) : (
                          <>
                            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                            Approve
                          </>
                        )}
                      </button>
                      
                      <button
                        onClick={() => openDenialModal(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Deny assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                        Deny
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              </li>
            );
          })}
        </ul>
      </div>

      {/* Denial Reason Modal */}
      {showDenialModal && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
          <div className="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
            <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>
            <span className="hidden sm:inline-block sm:align-middle sm:h-screen" aria-hidden="true">&#8203;</span>
            
            <div className="inline-block align-bottom bg-white rounded-lg px-4 pt-5 pb-4 text-left overflow-hidden shadow-xl transform transition-all sm:my-8 sm:align-middle sm:max-w-lg sm:w-full sm:p-6">
              <div>
                <div className="mx-auto flex items-center justify-center h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-red-100">
                  <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-6 w-6 text-red-600" aria-hidden="true" />
                </div>
                <div className="mt-3 text-center sm:mt-5">
                  <h3 className="text-lg leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900" id="modal-title">
                    Deny Assignment
                  </h3>
                  <div className="mt-2">
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                      Please provide a reason for denying this assignment. This will be visible to the person who created it.
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <div className="mt-4">
                    <label htmlFor="denial-reason" className="sr-only">
                      Denial reason
                    </label>
                    <textarea
                      id="denial-reason"
                      rows={4}
                      className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm"
                      placeholder="Enter reason for denial..."
                      value={denialReason}
                      onChange={(e) => setDenialReason(e.target.value)}
                      maxLength={500}
                    />
                    <p className="mt-1 text-xs text-gray-500">
                      {denialReason.length}/500 characters
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="mt-5 sm:mt-6 sm:grid sm:grid-cols-2 sm:gap-3 sm:grid-flow-row-dense">
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-base font-medium text-white hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 sm:col-start-2 sm:text-sm disabled:opacity-50"
                  onClick={() => handleDeny(showDenialModal)}
                  disabled={!denialReason.trim() || processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  {processingId === showDenialModal ? 'Processing...' : 'Deny Assignment'}
                </button>
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="mt-3 w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-base font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 sm:mt-0 sm:col-start-1 sm:text-sm"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowDenialModal(null);
                    setDenialReason('');
                  }}
                  disabled={processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

              ? { ...a, status: 'denied' as const, deniedReason }
              : a
          ));
        }
        setShowDenialModal(null);
        setDenialReason('');
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to deny assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error denying assignment:', error);
      showToast(`Failed to deny assignment: ${error.message}`, 'error');
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const openDenialModal = (assignmentId: string) => {
    setShowDenialModal(assignmentId);
    setDenialReason('');
  };

  const formatDateTime = (dateTimeStr: string) => {
    const date = new Date(dateTimeStr);
    return {
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      time: date.toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })
    };
  };

  const getStatusBadge = (status: Assignment['status']) => {
    switch (status) {
      case 'pending':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800">
            <ClockIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Pending
          </span>
        );
      case 'approved':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800">
            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Approved
          </span>
        );
      case 'denied':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-100 text-red-800">
            <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Denied
          </span>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <PageLoading message="Loading assignments..." />;
  }

  if (!canApprove && showPendingOnly) {
    return (
      <div className="p-6 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg">
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-400 mr-2" />
          <p className="text-sm text-yellow-700">
            You do not have permission to approve assignments. Contact an administrator or instructor.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (assignments.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="text-center py-12">
        <ClockIcon className="mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-gray-400" />
        <h3 className="mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
          {showPendingOnly ? 'No pending assignments' : 'No assignments found'}
        </h3>
        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
          {showPendingOnly 
            ? 'All assignments have been processed.' 
            : 'Assignments will appear here when created.'
          }
        </p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="space-y-4">
      <div className="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-md">
        <ul className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
          {assignments.map((assignment) => {
            const { date, time } = formatDateTime(assignment.startTime);
            const isProcessing = processingId === assignment.id;
            
            return (
              <li key={assignment.id} className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                  <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
                    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                        <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate">
                          {assignment.eventTitle}
                        </h3>
                        {getStatusBadge(assignment.status)}
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                        {date} at {time}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Student:</span> {assignment.studentName}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Type:</span> {assignment.eventType}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Location:</span> {assignment.location}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Duration:</span> {assignment.duration} min
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <span className="font-medium">Responsible Party:</span> {assignment.responsibleParty}
                      {assignment.pointOfContact && (
                        <span className="ml-4">
                          <span className="font-medium">Contact:</span> {assignment.pointOfContact}
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                    
                    {assignment.notes && (
                      <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span className="font-medium">Notes:</span> {assignment.notes}
                      </div>
                    )}
                    
                    {assignment.deniedReason && (
                      <div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded text-sm text-red-700">
                        <span className="font-medium">Denial Reason:</span> {assignment.deniedReason}
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  
                  {canApprove && assignment.status === 'pending' && (
                    <div className="ml-6 flex space-x-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleApprove(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Approve assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        {isProcessing ? (
                          <span className="flex items-center">
                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-3 w-3 border-b-2 border-white mr-1"></div>
                            Processing...
                          </span>
                        ) : (
                          <>
                            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                            Approve
                          </>
                        )}
                      </button>
                      
                      <button
                        onClick={() => openDenialModal(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Deny assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                        Deny
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              </li>
            );
          })}
        </ul>
      </div>

      {/* Denial Reason Modal */}
      {showDenialModal && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
          <div className="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
            <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>
            <span className="hidden sm:inline-block sm:align-middle sm:h-screen" aria-hidden="true">&#8203;</span>
            
            <div className="inline-block align-bottom bg-white rounded-lg px-4 pt-5 pb-4 text-left overflow-hidden shadow-xl transform transition-all sm:my-8 sm:align-middle sm:max-w-lg sm:w-full sm:p-6">
              <div>
                <div className="mx-auto flex items-center justify-center h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-red-100">

                      Denial reason
                    </label>

                      id="denial-reason"

                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

                  type="button"
                  className="w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-base font-medium text-white hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 sm:col-start-2 sm:text-sm disabled:opacity-50"
                  onClick={() => handleDeny(showDenialModal)}
                  disabled={!denialReason.trim() || processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  {processingId === showDenialModal ? 'Processing...' : 'Deny Assignment'}
                </button>
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="mt-3 w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-base font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 sm:mt-0 sm:col-start-1 sm:text-sm"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowDenialModal(null);
                    setDenialReason('');
                  }}
                  disabled={processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useSession } from 'next-auth/react';
import { useToast } from '@/components/ui/Toast';
import { CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline';
import { LoadingOverlay, PageLoading } from '@/components/ui/LoadingStates';
import { hasPermission } from '@/lib/permissions';

interface Assignment {
  id: string;
  studentName: string;
  eventType: string;
  eventTitle: string;
  location: string;
  startTime: string;
  duration: number;
  notes?: string;
  responsibleParty: string;
  pointOfContact?: string;
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'denied';
  createdBy?: string;
  createdAt: string;
  deniedReason?: string;
}

interface AssignmentApprovalProps {
  showPendingOnly?: boolean;
}

export function AssignmentApproval({ showPendingOnly = true }: AssignmentApprovalProps) {
  const { data: session } = useSession();
  const { showToast } = useToast();
  const [assignments, setAssignments] = useState<Assignment[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [processingId, setProcessingId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [denialReason, setDenialReason] = useState<string>('');
  const [showDenialModal, setShowDenialModal] = useState<string | null>(null);

  const canApprove = session?.user && hasPermission(session.user.role, 'approveAssignments');

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchAssignments();
  }, []);

  const fetchAssignments = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetch('/api/assignments');
      if (response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        // Filter assignments based on props and user permissions
        let filteredData = data;
        
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          filteredData = data.filter((assignment: Assignment) => assignment.status === 'pending');
        }
        
        setAssignments(filteredData);
      } else {
        throw new Error('Failed to fetch assignments');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching assignments:', error);
      showToast({ 
        type: 'error', 
        title: 'Failed to load assignments',
        message: 'Please check your connection and try again.'
      });
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleApprove = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to approve assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        const result = await response.json();
        showToast({
          type: 'success',
          title: 'Assignment approved',
          message: 'Assignment approved successfully'
        });
        // Remove approved assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'approved' as const }
              : a
          ));
        }
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to approve assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error approving assignment:', error);
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Approval failed',
        message: `Failed to approve assignment: ${error.message}`
      });
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const handleDeny = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to deny assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    if (!denialReason.trim()) {
      showToast('Please provide a reason for denial', 'warning');
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'DELETE',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({ reason: denialReason }),
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        showToast('Assignment denied', 'success');
        // Remove denied assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'denied' as const, deniedReason }
              : a
          ));
        }
        setShowDenialModal(null);
        setDenialReason('');
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to deny assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error denying assignment:', error);
      showToast(`Failed to deny assignment: ${error.message}`, 'error');
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const openDenialModal = (assignmentId: string) => {
    setShowDenialModal(assignmentId);
    setDenialReason('');
  };

  const formatDateTime = (dateTimeStr: string) => {
    const date = new Date(dateTimeStr);
    return {
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      time: date.toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })
    };
  };

  const getStatusBadge = (status: Assignment['status']) => {
    switch (status) {
      case 'pending':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800">
            <ClockIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Pending
          </span>
        );
      case 'approved':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800">
            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Approved
          </span>
        );
      case 'denied':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-100 text-red-800">
            <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Denied
          </span>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <PageLoading message="Loading assignments..." />;
  }

  if (!canApprove && showPendingOnly) {
    return (
      <div className="p-6 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg">
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-400 mr-2" />
          <p className="text-sm text-yellow-700">
            You do not have permission to approve assignments. Contact an administrator or instructor.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (assignments.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="text-center py-12">
        <ClockIcon className="mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-gray-400" />
        <h3 className="mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
          {showPendingOnly ? 'No pending assignments' : 'No assignments found'}
        </h3>
        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
          {showPendingOnly 
            ? 'All assignments have been processed.' 
            : 'Assignments will appear here when created.'
          }
        </p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="space-y-4">
      <div className="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-md">
        <ul className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
          {assignments.map((assignment) => {
            const { date, time } = formatDateTime(assignment.startTime);
            const isProcessing = processingId === assignment.id;
            
            return (
              <li key={assignment.id} className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                  <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
                    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                        <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate">
                          {assignment.eventTitle}
                        </h3>
                        {getStatusBadge(assignment.status)}
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                        {date} at {time}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Student:</span> {assignment.studentName}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Type:</span> {assignment.eventType}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Location:</span> {assignment.location}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Duration:</span> {assignment.duration} min
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <span className="font-medium">Responsible Party:</span> {assignment.responsibleParty}
                      {assignment.pointOfContact && (
                        <span className="ml-4">
                          <span className="font-medium">Contact:</span> {assignment.pointOfContact}
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                    
                    {assignment.notes && (
                      <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span className="font-medium">Notes:</span> {assignment.notes}
                      </div>
                    )}
                    
                    {assignment.deniedReason && (
                      <div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded text-sm text-red-700">
                        <span className="font-medium">Denial Reason:</span> {assignment.deniedReason}

                  {canApprove && assignment.status === 'pending' && (

                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleApprove(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Approve assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >

                            Processing...
                          </span>
                        ) : (
                          <>
                            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                            Approve
                          </>
                        )}
                      </button>
                      
                      <button
                        onClick={() => openDenialModal(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Deny assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                        Deny
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              </li>
            );
          })}
        </ul>
      </div>

      {/* Denial Reason Modal */}
      {showDenialModal && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
          <div className="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
            <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>

                  <div className="mt-4">

                    <textarea

                    <p className="mt-1 text-xs text-gray-500">

                </div>

              <div className="mt-5 sm:mt-6 sm:grid sm:grid-cols-2 sm:gap-3 sm:grid-flow-row-dense">
                <button
                  type="button"

                  onClick={() => handleDeny(showDenialModal)}

                >
                  {processingId === showDenialModal ? 'Processing...' : 'Deny Assignment'}
                </button>
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="mt-3 w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-base font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 sm:mt-0 sm:col-start-1 sm:text-sm"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowDenialModal(null);
                    setDenialReason('');

                  disabled={processingId === showDenialModal}

'use client';

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useSession } from 'next-auth/react';
import { useToast } from '@/components/ui/Toast';
import { CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline';
import { LoadingOverlay, PageLoading } from '@/components/ui/LoadingStates';
import { hasPermission } from '@/lib/permissions';

interface Assignment {
  id: string;
  studentName: string;
  eventType: string;
  eventTitle: string;
  location: string;
  startTime: string;
  duration: number;
  notes?: string;
  responsibleParty: string;
  pointOfContact?: string;
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'denied';
  createdBy?: string;
  createdAt: string;
  deniedReason?: string;
}

interface AssignmentApprovalProps {
  showPendingOnly?: boolean;
}

export function AssignmentApproval({ showPendingOnly = true }: AssignmentApprovalProps) {
  const { data: session } = useSession();
  const { showToast } = useToast();
  const [assignments, setAssignments] = useState<Assignment[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [processingId, setProcessingId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [denialReason, setDenialReason] = useState<string>('');
  const [showDenialModal, setShowDenialModal] = useState<string | null>(null);

  const canApprove = session?.user && hasPermission(session.user.role, 'approveAssignments');

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchAssignments();
  }, []);

  const fetchAssignments = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetch('/api/assignments');
      if (response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        // Filter assignments based on props and user permissions
        let filteredData = data;
        
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          filteredData = data.filter((assignment: Assignment) => assignment.status === 'pending');
        }
        
        setAssignments(filteredData);
      } else {
        throw new Error('Failed to fetch assignments');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching assignments:', error);
      showToast({ 
        type: 'error', 
        title: 'Failed to load assignments',
        message: 'Please check your connection and try again.'
      });
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleApprove = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to approve assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        const result = await response.json();
        showToast({
          type: 'success',
          title: 'Assignment approved',
          message: 'Assignment approved successfully'
        });
        // Remove approved assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'approved' as const }
              : a
          ));
        }
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to approve assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error approving assignment:', error);
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Approval failed',
        message: `Failed to approve assignment: ${error.message}`
      });
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const handleDeny = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to deny assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    if (!denialReason.trim()) {
      showToast({
        type: 'warning',
        title: 'Reason required',
        message: 'Please provide a reason for denial'
      });
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'DELETE',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({ reason: denialReason }),
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        showToast('Assignment denied', 'success');
        // Remove denied assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'denied' as const, deniedReason }
              : a
          ));
        }
        setShowDenialModal(null);
        setDenialReason('');
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to deny assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error denying assignment:', error);
      showToast(`Failed to deny assignment: ${error.message}`, 'error');
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const openDenialModal = (assignmentId: string) => {
    setShowDenialModal(assignmentId);
    setDenialReason('');
  };

  const formatDateTime = (dateTimeStr: string) => {
    const date = new Date(dateTimeStr);
    return {
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      time: date.toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })
    };
  };

  const getStatusBadge = (status: Assignment['status']) => {
    switch (status) {
      case 'pending':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800">
            <ClockIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Pending
          </span>
        );
      case 'approved':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800">
            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Approved
          </span>
        );
      case 'denied':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-100 text-red-800">
            <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Denied
          </span>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <PageLoading message="Loading assignments..." />;
  }

  if (!canApprove && showPendingOnly) {
    return (
      <div className="p-6 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg">
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-400 mr-2" />
          <p className="text-sm text-yellow-700">
            You do not have permission to approve assignments. Contact an administrator or instructor.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (assignments.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="text-center py-12">
        <ClockIcon className="mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-gray-400" />
        <h3 className="mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
          {showPendingOnly ? 'No pending assignments' : 'No assignments found'}
        </h3>
        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
          {showPendingOnly 
            ? 'All assignments have been processed.' 
            : 'Assignments will appear here when created.'
          }
        </p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="space-y-4">
      <div className="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-md">
        <ul className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
          {assignments.map((assignment) => {
            const { date, time } = formatDateTime(assignment.startTime);
            const isProcessing = processingId === assignment.id;
            
            return (
              <li key={assignment.id} className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                  <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
                    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                        <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate">
                          {assignment.eventTitle}
                        </h3>
                        {getStatusBadge(assignment.status)}
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                        {date} at {time}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Student:</span> {assignment.studentName}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Type:</span> {assignment.eventType}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Location:</span> {assignment.location}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Duration:</span> {assignment.duration} min
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <span className="font-medium">Responsible Party:</span> {assignment.responsibleParty}
                      {assignment.pointOfContact && (
                        <span className="ml-4">
                          <span className="font-medium">Contact:</span> {assignment.pointOfContact}
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                    
                    {assignment.notes && (
                      <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span className="font-medium">Notes:</span> {assignment.notes}
                      </div>
                    )}
                    
                    {assignment.deniedReason && (
                      <div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded text-sm text-red-700">
                        <span className="font-medium">Denial Reason:</span> {assignment.deniedReason}
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  
                  {canApprove && assignment.status === 'pending' && (
                    <div className="ml-6 flex space-x-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleApprove(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Approve assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        {isProcessing ? (
                          <span className="flex items-center">
                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-3 w-3 border-b-2 border-white mr-1"></div>
                            Processing...
                          </span>
                        ) : (
                          <>
                            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                            Approve
                          </>
                        )}
                      </button>
                      
                      <button
                        onClick={() => openDenialModal(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Deny assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                        Deny
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              </li>
            );
          })}
        </ul>
      </div>

      {/* Denial Reason Modal */}
      {showDenialModal && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
          <div className="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
            <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>
            <span className="hidden sm:inline-block sm:align-middle sm:h-screen" aria-hidden="true">&#8203;</span>
            
            <div className="inline-block align-bottom bg-white rounded-lg px-4 pt-5 pb-4 text-left overflow-hidden shadow-xl transform transition-all sm:my-8 sm:align-middle sm:max-w-lg sm:w-full sm:p-6">
              <div>
                <div className="mx-auto flex items-center justify-center h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-red-100">
                  <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-6 w-6 text-red-600" aria-hidden="true" />
                </div>
                <div className="mt-3 text-center sm:mt-5">
                  <h3 className="text-lg leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900" id="modal-title">
                    Deny Assignment
                  </h3>
                  <div className="mt-2">
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                      Please provide a reason for denying this assignment. This will be visible to the person who created it.
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <div className="mt-4">
                    <label htmlFor="denial-reason" className="sr-only">
                      Denial reason
                    </label>
                    <textarea
                      id="denial-reason"
                      rows={4}
                      className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm"
                      placeholder="Enter reason for denial..."
                      value={denialReason}
                      onChange={(e) => setDenialReason(e.target.value)}
                      maxLength={500}
                    />
                    <p className="mt-1 text-xs text-gray-500">
                      {denialReason.length}/500 characters
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="mt-5 sm:mt-6 sm:grid sm:grid-cols-2 sm:gap-3 sm:grid-flow-row-dense">
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-base font-medium text-white hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 sm:col-start-2 sm:text-sm disabled:opacity-50"
                  onClick={() => handleDeny(showDenialModal)}
                  disabled={!denialReason.trim() || processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  {processingId === showDenialModal ? 'Processing...' : 'Deny Assignment'}
                </button>
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="mt-3 w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-base font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 sm:mt-0 sm:col-start-1 sm:text-sm"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowDenialModal(null);
                    setDenialReason('');
                  }}
                  disabled={processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

                        aria-label={`Deny assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}

                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                        Deny

                  )}

              </li>
            );
          })}

      {showDenialModal && (

          <div className="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
            <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>

              <div>

                  onClick={() => handleDeny(showDenialModal)}
                  disabled={!denialReason.trim() || processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  {processingId === showDenialModal ? 'Processing...' : 'Deny Assignment'}
                </button>
                <button
                  type="button"

                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowDenialModal(null);
                    setDenialReason('');
                  }}
                  disabled={processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>

            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );

```typescriptreact
'use client';

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useSession } from 'next-auth/react';
import { useToast } from '@/components/ui/Toast';
import { CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline';
import { LoadingOverlay, PageLoading } from '@/components/ui/LoadingStates';
import { hasPermission } from '@/lib/permissions';

interface Assignment {
  id: string;
  studentName: string;
  eventType: string;
  eventTitle: string;
  location: string;
  startTime: string;
  duration: number;
  notes?: string;
  responsibleParty: string;
  pointOfContact?: string;
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'denied';
  createdBy?: string;
  createdAt: string;
  deniedReason?: string;
}

interface AssignmentApprovalProps {
  showPendingOnly?: boolean;
}

export function AssignmentApproval({ showPendingOnly = true }: AssignmentApprovalProps) {
  const { data: session } = useSession();
  const { showToast } = useToast();
  const [assignments, setAssignments] = useState<Assignment[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [processingId, setProcessingId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [denialReason, setDenialReason] = useState<string>('');
  const [showDenialModal, setShowDenialModal] = useState<string | null>(null);

  const canApprove = session?.user && hasPermission(session.user.role, 'approveAssignments');

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchAssignments();
  }, []);

  const fetchAssignments = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetch('/api/assignments');
      if (response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        // Filter assignments based on props and user permissions
        let filteredData = data;
        
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          filteredData = data.filter((assignment: Assignment) => assignment.status === 'pending');
        }
        
        setAssignments(filteredData);
      } else {
        throw new Error('Failed to fetch assignments');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching assignments:', error);
      showToast({ 
        type: 'error', 
        title: 'Failed to load assignments',
        message: 'Please check your connection and try again.'
      });
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const handleApprove = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to approve assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        const result = await response.json();
        showToast({
          type: 'success',
          title: 'Assignment approved',
          message: 'Assignment approved successfully'
        });
        // Remove approved assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'approved' as const }
              : a
          ));
        }
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to approve assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error approving assignment:', error);
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Approval failed',
        message: `Failed to approve assignment: ${error.message}`
      });
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const handleDeny = async (assignmentId: string) => {
    if (!canApprove) {
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Permission denied',
        message: 'You do not have permission to deny assignments'
      });
      return;
    }

    if (!denialReason.trim()) {
      showToast({
        type: 'warning',
        title: 'Reason required',
        message: 'Please provide a reason for denial'
      });
      return;
    }

    setProcessingId(assignmentId);
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`/api/assignments/${assignmentId}/approve`, {
        method: 'DELETE',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({ reason: denialReason }),
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        showToast({
          type: 'success',
          title: 'Assignment denied',
          message: 'Assignment has been denied successfully'
        });
        // Remove denied assignment from the list if showing pending only
        if (showPendingOnly) {
          setAssignments(prev => prev.filter(a => a.id !== assignmentId));
        } else {
          // Update the assignment status
          setAssignments(prev => prev.map(a => 
            a.id === assignmentId 
              ? { ...a, status: 'denied' as const, deniedReason }
              : a
          ));
        }
        setShowDenialModal(null);
        setDenialReason('');
      } else {
        const error = await response.json();
        throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to deny assignment');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error denying assignment:', error);
      showToast({
        type: 'error',
        title: 'Denial failed',
        message: `Failed to deny assignment: ${error.message}`
      });
    } finally {
      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const openDenialModal = (assignmentId: string) => {
    setShowDenialModal(assignmentId);
    setDenialReason('');
  };

  const formatDateTime = (dateTimeStr: string) => {
    const date = new Date(dateTimeStr);
    return {
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      time: date.toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })
    };
  };

  const getStatusBadge = (status: Assignment['status']) => {
    switch (status) {
      case 'pending':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800">
            <ClockIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Pending
          </span>
        );
      case 'approved':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800">
            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Approved
          </span>
        );
      case 'denied':
        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-red-100 text-red-800">
            <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
            Denied
          </span>
        );
      default:
        return null;
    }
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <PageLoading message="Loading assignments..." />;
  }

  if (!canApprove && showPendingOnly) {
    return (
      <div className="p-6 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg">
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-400 mr-2" />
          <p className="text-sm text-yellow-700">
            You do not have permission to approve assignments. Contact an administrator or instructor.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (assignments.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="text-center py-12">
        <ClockIcon className="mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-gray-400" />
        <h3 className="mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
          {showPendingOnly ? 'No pending assignments' : 'No assignments found'}
        </h3>
        <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
          {showPendingOnly 
            ? 'All assignments have been processed.' 
            : 'Assignments will appear here when created.'
          }
        </p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="space-y-4">
      <div className="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-md">
        <ul className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
          {assignments.map((assignment) => {
            const { date, time } = formatDateTime(assignment.startTime);
            const isProcessing = processingId === assignment.id;
            
            return (
              <li key={assignment.id} className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                  <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
                    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                      <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                        <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate">
                          {assignment.eventTitle}
                        </h3>
                        {getStatusBadge(assignment.status)}
                      </div>
                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                        {date} at {time}
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Student:</span> {assignment.studentName}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Type:</span> {assignment.eventType}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Location:</span> {assignment.location}
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <span className="font-medium">Duration:</span> {assignment.duration} min
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                      <span className="font-medium">Responsible Party:</span> {assignment.responsibleParty}
                      {assignment.pointOfContact && (
                        <span className="ml-4">
                          <span className="font-medium">Contact:</span> {assignment.pointOfContact}
                        </span>
                      )}
                    </div>
                    
                    {assignment.notes && (
                      <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span className="font-medium">Notes:</span> {assignment.notes}
                      </div>
                    )}
                    
                    {assignment.deniedReason && (
                      <div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded text-sm text-red-700">
                        <span className="font-medium">Denial Reason:</span> {assignment.deniedReason}
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  
                  {canApprove && assignment.status === 'pending' && (
                    <div className="ml-6 flex space-x-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleApprove(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Approve assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        {isProcessing ? (
                          <span className="flex items-center">
                            <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-3 w-3 border-b-2 border-white mr-1"></div>
                            Processing...
                          </span>
                        ) : (
                          <>
                            <CheckIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                            Approve
                          </>
                        )}
                      </button>
                      
                      <button
                        onClick={() => openDenialModal(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Deny assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3 mr-1" />
                        Deny
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              </li>
            );
          })}
        </ul>
      </div>

      {/* Denial Reason Modal */}
      {showDenialModal && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto" aria-labelledby="modal-title" role="dialog" aria-modal="true">
          <div className="flex items-end justify-center min-h-screen pt-4 px-4 pb-20 text-center sm:block sm:p-0">
            <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 transition-opacity" aria-hidden="true"></div>
            <span className="hidden sm:inline-block sm:align-middle sm:h-screen" aria-hidden="true">&#8203;</span>
            
            <div className="inline-block align-bottom bg-white rounded-lg px-4 pt-5 pb-4 text-left overflow-hidden shadow-xl transform transition-all sm:my-8 sm:align-middle sm:max-w-lg sm:w-full sm:p-6">
              <div>
                <div className="mx-auto flex items-center justify-center h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-red-100">
                  <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-6 w-6 text-red-600" aria-hidden="true" />
                </div>
                <div className="mt-3 text-center sm:mt-5">
                  <h3 className="text-lg leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900" id="modal-title">
                    Deny Assignment
                  </h3>
                  <div className="mt-2">
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                      Please provide a reason for denying this assignment. This will be visible to the person who created it.
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <div className="mt-4">
                    <label htmlFor="denial-reason" className="sr-only">
                      Denial reason
                    </label>
                    <textarea
                      id="denial-reason"
                      rows={4}
                      className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm"
                      placeholder="Enter reason for denial..."
                      value={denialReason}
                      onChange={(e) => setDenialReason(e.target.value)}
                      maxLength={500}
                    />
                    <p className="mt-1 text-xs text-gray-500">
                      {denialReason.length}/500 characters
                    </p>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div className="mt-5 sm:mt-6 sm:grid sm:grid-cols-2 sm:gap-3 sm:grid-flow-row-dense">
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-base font-medium text-white hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500 sm:col-start-2 sm:text-sm disabled:opacity-50"
                  onClick={() => handleDeny(showDenialModal)}
                  disabled={!denialReason.trim() || processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  {processingId === showDenialModal ? 'Processing...' : 'Deny Assignment'}
                </button>
                <button
                  type="button"
                  className="mt-3 w-full inline-flex justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 shadow-sm px-4 py-2 bg-white text-base font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 sm:mt-0 sm:col-start-1 sm:text-sm"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setShowDenialModal(null);
                    setDenialReason('');
                  }}
                  disabled={processingId === showDenialModal}
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );

      setProcessingId(null);
    }
  };

  const openDenialModal = (assignmentId: string) => {
    setShowDenialModal(assignmentId);
    setDenialReason('');
  };

  const formatDateTime = (dateTimeStr: string) => {
    const date = new Date(dateTimeStr);
    return {
      date: date.toLocaleDateString(),
      time: date.toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })
    };

  const getStatusBadge = (status: Assignment['status']) => {
    switch (status) {

        return (
          <span className="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800">

  if (loading) {

  if (!canApprove && showPendingOnly) {
    return (
      <div className="p-6 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg">
        <div className="flex items-center">
          <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-400 mr-2" />
          <p className="text-sm text-yellow-700">

  if (assignments.length === 0) {

                      <div className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">

                      <div className="mt-2 p-2 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded text-sm text-red-700">
                        <span className="font-medium">Denial Reason:</span> {assignment.deniedReason}
                      </div>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  
                  {canApprove && assignment.status === 'pending' && (
                    <div className="ml-6 flex space-x-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleApprove(assignment.id)}
                        disabled={isProcessing}
                        className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1.5 border border-transparent text-xs font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-600 hover:bg-green-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500 disabled:opacity-50"
                        aria-label={`Approve assignment for ${assignment.studentName}`}
                      >

                  onClick={() => {

                    setDenialReason('');
                  }}

                >
                  Cancel
